A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Great fun but destroying Luke as a Character was a poor decision. Those story arcs are 40 years old and to sell out the franchise so that they can position new charaters is cheap;   It's so out of step with what's gone before its painful to watch. Many will enjoy it but I mostly found it annoying. Its sad  that spin off films (RogueOne) are setting the pace. Lazy Disney cartoon characters wont cut it
